text: Koly vony vesʹ stend pered tym, yak BOH, poslidovnyky skazhutʹ lideram, "My zvychayno sliduvaly za vamy. Vy mozhete zekonomyty nas navitʹ troshky BOZHOHO retribution?" Vony skazhutʹ, "Maly BOHA kerovani ny, my by keruvaly vamy. Zaraz yomu zapiznyuyetʹsya nadto, my sumuyemo chy abo vdayemosʹ do terpinnya, nemaye vykhodu dlya nas
